owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An organization that funds this Project or research activities to create this Resource.
研究資金プログラム提供者
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: funder

owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: The Research Data Management Ontology (RDM) is developed to describe research data and all activities related to its management. RDM was developed as a communication hub between the NII Research Data Cloud (NII-RDC) systems, but is being developed as an ontology that can be applied to any research data management platform.
研究データ管理オントロジー (RDM) は、研究データとその管理に関わるすべての活動を記述することを目的として設計されました。RDM は NII 研究データクラウド (NII-RDC) の基盤間でのコミュニケーションハブとして開発されましたが、あらゆる研究データ管理プラットフォームに応用できるオントロジーとしても開発

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource または情報などを取得する行動
An act of getting/obtaining Resource, information etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Get

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 権利や許可を与える行動
An act of granting permission or right to an object.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Authorize

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The object that helped the agent perform the Activity.
行動を補助した道具、ツール
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: instrument

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource を新たな Resource に変換する行動
An act of converting Resource into a new Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Convert

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Dataset のフォルダ構成を変更する行動
An act of changing folder structure of Dataset.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Reorganize

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 検索ボタンの押下など、Resoure を検索する行動
An act of searching Resource, such as by pushing "search" button.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Search

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: レポート、報告書
A report.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Report

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource や情報を提出・提供する行動
An act of submitting or providing Resource/information.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Submit

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: グラフを生成するなど、データを元に可視化する行動
An act of creating a visualization based on data, such as making a graph.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Visualize

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: サービスを別のサービスに接続する行動
An act of connecting service to another service.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Connect

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A URL related to this Class.
主語クラスに関連するURL
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: url

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource を匿名化する行動
An act of making Resource anonymous.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Anonymize

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Context of this Event implementation e.g. reasons and backgrounds for implementation.
実施に至った理由や背景など、イベント実施のコンテクスト
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: purpose

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A thumbnail of this Resource.
サムネイル
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: thumbnail

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The direct performer or driver of this Activity.
行動・行為の直接的な実施者
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: agent

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A grant program for this Project or research activities to create this Resource.
研究資金プログラム
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: funding

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource をダウンロードする行動
An act of downloading Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Download

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 標準
A standard.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Standard

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: キュレーションの一環として、メタデータを意味付けする行動
An act of semanticizing metadata as part of data curation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Semantize

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A research field of this Project/Resource.
プロジェクト・リソースの主題
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: field

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: その他のリソース
An other Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: OtherResource

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Conditions and method of access to the Resource under access restrictions.
アクセス権が限定公開の場合のアクセス条件と方法
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: dataAccessRequirements

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Person に役割を任命する行動
An act of assigning a role to Person.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Assign

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A technique, method or technology used to create research data.
研究データの収集・取得方法
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: measurementTechnique

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Repository, SoftwareApplication もしくはその他サービスに、 Resource を登録する行動
An act of registering Resource to Repository, SoftwareApplication or other service.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Register

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The creator/author of this Resource.
リソースの作成者
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: creator

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The creator of research data to be described in this DataManagementPlan.
DMPにおける研究データの作成者
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: dataCreater

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: 他のプロパティに当てはまらないアプリケーションに必要な条件
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: specialRequirements

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Contacts for data management organizations and managers to be described in this DataManagementPlan.
DMPにおけるデータ管理機関・管理者への連絡先
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: contact

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: 主語クラスの大きさ、サイズ
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: size

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The number of items in this Collection.
所定のパッケージに含まれるデータセットの総数
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: collectionSize

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: プレプリント
A preprint.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Preprint

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Operating systems supported by this SoftwareApplication.
アプリケーションがサポートされているOS
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: operatingSystem

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An identifier information of this Class.
識別子
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: identifierInformation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The identifier of research data to be described in this DataManagementPlan.
DMPにおけるデータ識別子
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: dataIdentifier

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Scheduled date of open access of the Resource under the rights of embargoed access.
公開猶予の場合の公開予定日
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: dateAvailable

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The date on which the Resource was most recently modified.
リソースの最終更新日
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: dateModified

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The start date of this Class.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: dateEnded

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The date on which this Resource was created.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: dateCreated

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A contributor to this Class.
クラスへの寄与者
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: contributor

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An Event organizer or host.
イベントの開催者、主催者
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: organizer

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The result produced in this Activity.
アクションによって生成された新しいエンティティ
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: result

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An Activity which created/generated this Class.
主語クラスが生成された行動
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: wasGeneratedBy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: カンファレンスプロシーディング
A conference proceeding.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConferenceProceeding

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource をデータクレンジングする行動
An act of performing data cleansing of Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Cleanse

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 提出された Resource や提案、割り当てられた役割などを取り下げる行動
An act of rejecting proposal/assigned role/submitted Resource etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Reject

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A detailed role of this Person.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: detailedRole

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The hosting institution of Resource and research data to be described in this DataManagementPlan.
Resource の管理機関、もしくはDMPにおける研究データ管理機関
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hostingInstitution

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: データセット
A dataset.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dataset

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 変更を反映させるなど、Resource を更新する行動
An act of updating Resource, such as applying a change.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Update

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource にメタデータを付与する行動
An act of adding metadata to Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Add

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 公開ボタンを押すなどして、Resoure を公開する行動(アクセス権の種類は問わない)
An act of making Resource public, such as by pushing "publish" button on publishing service. (including Resource of any access rights)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Publish

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The description of research data to be described in this DataManagementPlan.
DMPにおけるデータの説明
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: dataDescription

owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:label: EmbargoedAccess
owl:NamedIndividual.rdfs:comment: Embargoed access (metadata only access until released for open access on a certain date).

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The end date of this Class.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: dateStarted

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource をフォーマットに合わせて編集する行動
An act of editting Resource to format.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Align

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource を送る行動
An act of dispatching Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Send

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Keywords used to describe this Resource.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: keywords

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: ピアレビューなど、Resource を評価する行動
An act of evaluating Resource, such as peer-review.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Evaluate

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A detailed type of this Resource.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: detailedType

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: カンファレンスペーパー
A conference paper.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConferencePaper

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Information on access rights of this Class.
クラスのアクセス権関連情報
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: accessRightsInformation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Information on access rights to be described in this DataManagementPlan.
DMPにおけるデータへのアクセス権
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: dataAccessRightsInformation

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A text description as Read Me of this SoftwareApplication.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: readme

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource, SoftwareApplication, プログラムを実行する行動
An act of executing SoftwareApplication, Resource, program etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Execute

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: キュレーションの一環として、メタデータを統合する行動
An act of integrating different forms of metadata as part of data curation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Integrate

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Person, Institution に対して通知する行動
An act of notifying Person/Institution of information.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Inform

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Project, Resource, Collection などを作成する行動
An act of creating/producing/generating Resource, Project, Collection etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Create

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource など、何かしらについて調査する行動
An act of making a survay of Resource or something.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Survey

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Approximate size of research data to be described in this DataManagementPlan.
DMPにおける概略データ量
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: approximateSize

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The date on which this Event information was most recently updated.
イベントの内容更新日
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: dateUpdated

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The indirect object, or target, of this Activity.
アクションの間接的な対象物
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: target

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: An additional name for this Person e.g. middle name.
ミドルネームなど、その他の名前
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: additionalName

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 選択肢の中から利用するものを選択する行動
An act of selecting from options.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Select

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The place where this Event was/will be held or this Resource was created.
主語クラスの開催場所・取得場所
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: location

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The data manager of research data to be described in this DataManagementPlan.
DMPにおける研究データ管理者
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: dataManager

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 音声
An audio file.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Audio

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: キュレーションの一環として、Resource のメタデータを外部から取得し付与する行動
An act of getting and adding metadata to Resource from public information as part of data curation.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ingest

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 教育関連資料
A Resource related to educational, such as slides for lecture.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: EducationalResource

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Information on license of this Class.
プロジェクトやリソースのライセンス情報
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: licenseInformation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The license of research data to be described in this DataManagementPlan.
DMPにおけるデータのライセンス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: dataLicenseInformation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Contents of data management plan of this Project/Resource.
資源やプロジェクトに紐づくデータ管理計画
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: dmp

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A institution which provides this DataManagementPlan format.
DMP種別の提供者
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: dmpFormatProvider

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Component dependency requirements for this SoftwareApplication.
アプリケーションコンポーネントの依存要件
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: softwareRequirements

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A researcher involved in this Project.
プロジェクトに参加した研究者
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: researcher

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: プログラミングで実装する行動
An act of developing a program.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Develop

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A name of identifier scheme e.g. DOI.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: identifierName

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Processor architecture required to run this SoftwareApplication.
アプリケーション実行に必要なプロセッサー要件
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: processorRequirements

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource をアーカイブする行動
An act of archiving Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Archive

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource の名称を変更する行動
An act of renaming Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rename

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The data number assigned to this DataManagementPlan.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: dataNumber

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource, SoftwareApplicationをデプロイする行動
An act of deploying SoftwareApplication or Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Deploy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: カンファレンスに関連するリソース
A Resource related to conferences.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConferenceObject

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: ジャーナル論文
An article published in a journal.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: JournalArticle

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: ダンプによりログファイルを作成する行動
An act of creating a log file by dumping.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dump

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource を SoftwareApplicationやRepository 等にアップロードする行動
An act of uploading Resource to Repository, SoftwareApplication etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Upload

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The recipient of this Activity and the affected party of this Activity.
行動を受け取る・行動の影響を受ける相手
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: recipient

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 学位論文
A thesis.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Thesis

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A manager of identifier scheme/service, e.g. International DOI Foundation.
国際DOI財団など、識別子の管理者
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: identifierManager

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class independent of this Class that is related to this Class.
主語クラスと何らかの関連がある、独立したクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isRelatedTo

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Resource which is identical to this Resource.
主語クラスと同一である Resource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isIdenticalTo

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which is published in this Class.
主語クラスをその一部として公開するクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isPublishedIn

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: チェックボックスに印をつけるなど、規定の項目に関して確認する行動
An act of checking the regulation for Resource, such as using checkboxes.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Check

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Person やチャットボットなどに質問をする行動
An act of asking questions to Person, chatbot etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ask

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The date on which this Resource was published.
リソースの発行日・公開日
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: datePublished

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: ジャーナル
A journal.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Journal

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 未来に行われる Event を設定する行動
An act of scheduling future Event.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Schedule

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource や依頼を承認する行動
An act of approving Resource or request.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Accept

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: ワークフロー
A workflow.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Workflow

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource を収集する行動
An act of collecting Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Collect

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 選択肢を提示する行動
An act of presenting or proposing options.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Suggest

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An organization that this Person is affiliated with.
人物の所属先機関
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: affiliation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Person, Institution に何らかのタスクを依頼する行動
An act of asking People/Institution to do something.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Request

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A MIME format of this Resource.
リソースのフォーマット
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: encodingFormat

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The format of research data to be described in this DataManagementPlan.
DMPで記述した研究データのフォーマット
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: dataEncodingFormat

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 表データをソートするなど、キュレーションの一環として Resource を再構成する行動
An act of re-structuring Resource as part of data curation, such as sorting a table.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Restructure

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource に対してコメントをする行動
An act of generating a comment on Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Comment

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 機械的に何かしらの情報を Resource などに付与する行動
An act of mechanically adding some information to Resource etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Record

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The acquisition date of this Resource.
外部ファイルの取得日
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: sdDatePublished

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 動画
A video file.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Video

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Resource which is documentation about/explaining this SoftwareApplication.
SoftwareApplication の説明文書・ドキュメントである Resource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isDocumentedBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A SoftwareApplication which is documented by this Resource.
Resource がその説明文書・ドキュメントに相当する SoftwareApplication
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: documents

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which is a new edition of this Class.
主語クラスが新版に当たる、旧版のクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isNewVersionOf

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which is a previous edition of this Class.
主語クラスが旧版に当たる、新版のクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isPreviousVersionOf

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class used to compile or create this Class.
主語クラスをコンパイルまたは作成するために使用するクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isCompiledBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The result of a compile or creation event using this Class.
主語クラスを使用したコンパイルまたは作成イベントの結果
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: compiles

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which this Class has as an another version.
主語クラスが異なるバージョンであるクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isVersionOf

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which is another version of this Class.
主語クラスの異なるバージョンとして存在するクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasVersion

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which is the original form of this Class.
主語クラスのオリジナルであるクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isVariantFormOf

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class of which this Class is the original form.
主語クラスをオリジナルとするクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isOriginalFormOf

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: プロパティの選択肢列挙のためのクラス
A Class for individuals of object enumeration.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Enumeration

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which is replaced by this Class.
主語クラスによって置き換えられたクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: obsoletes

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which replaces this Class.
主語クラスを廃止させたクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isObsoletedBy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 学会など、イベントや催し物
An event, such as conferences etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Event

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which is reviewed by this Class.
主語クラスによってレビューされたクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: reviews

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which is a review of this Class.
主語クラスのレビューとなっているクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isReviewdBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An higher-level property that indicates inclusion relationship between Classes.
主語クラスと包含関係のあるクラスを指す上位プロパティ
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: inclusionRelation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class of the parts that make up this class
主語クラスを構成する部分のクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isPartOf

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A class consisting of multiple parts of which this class is a part.
主語クラスが一部分となっている、複数の部分から成るクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasPart

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 人物
A person.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Person

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource に変更を加える行動. 編集画面を利用したドラフトとしての変更を意味し、与えた変更の反映は含意しない
An act of editing Resource. This class implies that changes have been made to the Resource as a draft, such as using edit UI, and does not involve whether they have been applied.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Edit

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class of which this Class is a continuation.
主語クラスが継続しているクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: continues

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class continued by this Class
主語クラスが継続されているクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isContinuedBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class that supplements this Class.
主語クラスが補足をしているクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isSupplementTo

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which is supplemented by this Class.
主語クラスを補足しているクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isSupplementedBy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: ソフトウェアアプリケーション
A software application.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: SoftwareApplication

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Resource included in this Collection.
コレクションに含まれるリソース
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: collectionItem

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Collection which includes this Resource as a member of Collection.
リソースをメンバーとして含むCollection
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: collectedIn

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Resource whithin this Project.
プロジェクトに含まれるリソース
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: projectItem

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Project this Resource is within/included in.
リソースが属するプロジェクト
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: inProject

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which collected/created by using this Class.
主語クラスを使用して収集・作成されたクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: collects

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class that is used to collect/create this Class.
主語クラスの収集・生成に利用されたクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isCollectedBy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: リソースへのアクセス権
An access right o Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AccessRights

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: An higher-level property that indicates some value of Classes.
クラスにおける何かしらの値を示す上位プロパティ
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: value

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which is required by this Class.
主語クラスを必要とするクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: requires

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which requires this Class.
主語クラスを必要とするクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isRequiredBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class from which this Class is derived.
主語クラスが基となっているクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isSourceOf

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class on which this Class is based.
主語クラスが基づいているクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isDerivedFrom

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 研究データや実験動画など、デジタルオブジェクト
A digital object, such as research data, video of experiments rtc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Resource

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Resource included in/within this Class.
主語クラスに含まれる、もしくは内部にあるリソース
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: item

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Repository or storage where this Resource is managed.
リソースが管理されているリポジトリやストレージ
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: storedIn

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Resource stored in this Repository.
リポジトリに保存されている資源
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: storedItem

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Resource which has additional metdata of this Class.
主語クラスの追加メタデータを持つ Resource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: hasMetadata

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class for which this Resource has additional metdata.
Resource が追加メタデータになっているクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isMetadataFor

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 画像
An image file.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Image

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Access rights type.
アクセス権の種別
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: conditionOfAccess

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class that this Resource describes.
Resource が説明しているクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: describes

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Resource that describes this Class.
主語クラスを説明している Resource
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isDescribedBy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 研究資金プログラム
A grant for research activities.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Grant

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 研究資金提供機関
An organization that funds reserch activities.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: FundingAgency

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An object of the Activity.
行動の対象物
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: object

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An Activity that has had some influence on this Class.
主語クラスが何らかの影響を受けた行動
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: wasInfluencedBy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 研究プロジェクト
A research project.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Project

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which uses this Class as a source of information.
主語クラスを情報源として参照しているクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isReferencedBy

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Class which is used as a source of information by this Class.
主語クラスの情報源となったクラス
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: references

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 行動や行為
An action or activity.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Activity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 権利関係全般に関連するクラス
An higher-level class that relates to various rights.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RightsStatement

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: リポジトリ
A repository.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Repository

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 書籍
A book.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Book

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: リソースのライセンス
An license of Resource.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: License

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 識別子
An identifier.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Identifier

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: データ管理計画(DMP)
A data management plan (DMP).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: DataManagementPlan

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Resource that this Class cites.
主語クラスが引用しているリソース
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: cites

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A Resource that this Class is cited.
主語クラスが引用されているリソース
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: isCitedBy

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: プロパティ rdm:conditionOfAccess の目的語の選択肢
An option of object for property rdm:conditionOfAccess.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: ConditionOfAccessEnumeration

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Resource を Repository, SoftwareApplication などに保存・保管する行動
An act of saving and storing Resource to Repository, SoftwareApplication etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Preserve

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: オブジェクトのコレクション
A collection of items.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Collection

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: 機関や組織
An organization.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Institution
